training: You will now play a few practice rounds.
instructions:
You will now see the instructions for the next game.

Press RIGHT to see next instructions.
Press LEFT to see previous instructions.
instructions_perm: Press LEFT to go back, RIGHT to proceed.
instructions_end: To start the game press RIGHT. To review the instructions press LEFT.

hcp.0.0:
This is a game of chance.
Think of it as drawing from a deck of cards.
The cards are numbered from one to nine.
You have to guess if the number you are about to see is LESS than or GREATER than five.
hcp.0.1:
Press LEFT to guess LESS than five.
Press RIGHT to guess GREATER than five.
You must answer while the question mark is shown.
hcp.1.0: After you answer, the card will be shown.
hcp.1.1:
If you guess correctly,
the diamond shape will go green and you WIN 1 point.
hcp.1.2: If you guess incorrectly the dimaond shape will go red and you LOSE 0.5 points.
hcp.1.3: If the card is five, the diamond shape goes yellow and your points don't change.
hcp.1.4: After each round, we shuffle the deck.
hcp.2.0:
Remember:
Press LEFT to guess the number is LESS less than five.
Press RIGHT to guess the number is GREATER than five.

gonogo.0.0:
In this game, you have to figure out whether it's better to press LEFT or NOT.
There are some situations where it's better to press LEFT
 .. and in others it would be better NOT to press.
In some situations you will play to WIN points,
 in other you will play to avoid LOSING points.
gonogo.0.1:
Each situation is signalled by one of four images.
For each image, you have to learn from experience if it is better to press LEFT or NOT
gonogo.1.0: On each trial, you will see an image like this that signals the situation:
gonogo.2.0: Then a diamond shape appears in the middle of the screen.
gonogo.3.0: When the outside turns white you need to decide, whether to press LEFT or NOT?
gonogo.4.1: If you win points, you wil see green.
gonogo.4.2: If you lose points you will see red.
gonogo.4.3: If your points don't change, you will see yellow.
gonogo.5.0:
Remember:
When the outside of the diamond turns white you need to decide, whether to press LEFT or NOT?

two-step.0.0:
In this game you will make a series of choices.
First, you will be given two images to choose from.
Your choice will take you to the second level.
two-step.1.0: Your first choice will lead to another choice between two images. The images you see will depend on your first choice.
two-step.1.1: Choosing an image in the second stage will sometimes earn you points and sometimes not. Some images are better than others, but which ones are better changes slowly during the experiment.
two-step.2.0: The structure of the game is as follows:
two-step.2.1: Each first-level choice has a 'preferred' second level. For example, if you choose the image with the cross, you'll usually see the blue (left) images, but sometimes you'll see the yellow images instead.
two-step.2.2: This preference stays the same throughout the game.
two-step.3.0:
Remember:
In each trial you will have to make two choices.
Press LEFT to select the image on the left.
Press RIGHT to select the image on the right.

mid.0.0: In this game you will see one of five images
mid.0.1:
In the middle of the image is how many points are at stake.
 You will see the image first, then you will see the diamond shape.
After this you will se a black shape.
When you see the black shape, you will need to press LEFT as fast as you can to win points or to avoid losing the points indicated by the image.
mid.1.0: So for example if you saw this image:
mid.1.1:
then if you respond (press LEFT) to the black shape in time, you will receive 5 points.

Whereas, if you see this image:
mid.1.2: then if you respond (press LEFT) to the black shape in time, you will avoid losing 5 points.
mid.2.0:
After the fixation there will always be a black shape that is the same shape as the one you just saw.
Your job is to press LEFT when you see a black shape.
mid.2.1: If you press to soon or do not press when the black shape is up, you will not receive the outcome for that shape.
mid.3.0:
Remember:

When you see a pink circle, you can WIN points.

When you see a yellow square, you can LOSE points.

When you see a blue triangle, there is nothing at stake.

Press LEFT when you see the black shape to WIN or AVOID LOSING indicated in the image.

posner.0.0:
In this game, you must respond to a target stimulus that briefly appears on either the left or the right side of the diamond shape.
To gain points, you must indicate the side on which the target appeared by pressing LEFT or RIGHT.
posner.1.0:
Before the target appears, an arrow will appear on either the left or the right side of the diamond.
The arrow can help you predict, the side where the target will appear next.
This game can be difficult, so pay attention to the arrow.
posner.2.0: The target is a diamond with a missing corner. After the arrow disappears, the target will appear, on either left or right.
posner.2.1: Another  shape will appear on the opposite side of the target.
posner.2.2:
Press LEFT if the target was on the left.
Press RIGHT if the target was on the right.
posner.3.0:
Please try to focus on the diamond shape for the entire game.
Do not move your eyes to the target.
posner.4.0:
Remember:
Press LEFT to indicate that the target appeared on the left.
Press RIGHT to indicate that the target appeared on the right.

Please respond as quickly and accurately as possible!

risk-sensitive.0.0:
In this game you will see five different images.
Each image has a different value.
Some images will always give you the same points, some images will give you points with 50% probability.
risk-sensitive.1.0: You will sometimes see a single image on the left or the right side of the screen. You must select this image by pressing LEFT if it is on the left and RIGHT if it is on the right.
risk-sensitive.2.0:
Sometimes, you have to decide between two images.
Choose in a way, that will earn you the most points.
Press LEFT to select the image on the left.
Press RIGHT to select the image on the right.
risk-sensitive.3.0:
Remember:
Press LEFT to select the image on the left.
Press RIGHT to select the image on the right.
